title: The complete works of Robert Burns :
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: The parish of Covington is a beautiful amphitheatre, with Wellbrae Hill to the east, Tinto and the Culter Fells to the south, and the prettj' green conical hill, Quothquan Law, to the east ; the whole scene being enlivened by the youthful Ch'de which wdnds its way through the centre, gathering volume from a hundred tributary rills.
